answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Greg, 
Unfortunately we do not have any documents specifically on ApplicationXtender although there is a document from a consulting project on building and choosing a document management system that may be of use to your member. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305663
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Aldis Levalds
answers.text:
I dont have specific experience with ApplicationXtender but Imex Systems has a variety of document management applications and in fact a comprehensive e-Government platform see www.imexsystems.com

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member that is looking for local governments that use digital document management software.  Specifically, I'm looking for information about experiences with ApplicationXtender:  http://www.emc.com/enterprise-content-management/applicationxtender/applicationxtender.htm.  
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka 
Central Regional Director 
Alliance for Innovation
title: Using Digital Management Software (ApplicationXtender)
